bandit_issue_text: Use of possibly insecure function - consider using safer ast.literal_eval.

pylint_message: Module 'lxml.etree' has not 'fromstring' member, but source is unavailable. Consider adding this module to extension-pkg-whitelist if you want to perform analysis based on run-time introspection of living objects.
bandit_issue_text: Using lxml.etree.fromstring to parse untrusted XML data is known to be vulnerable to XML attacks. Replace lxml.etree.fromstring with its defusedxml equivalent function.

pylint_message: third party import "import lxml" should be placed before "from collective.transmogrifier.interfaces import ISection"
bandit_issue_text: Using lxml to parse untrusted XML data is known to be vulnerable to XML attacks. Replace lxml with the equivalent defusedxml package.
